Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: As our teachers are marking our work, I take on their feedback as I know it will help improve my final mark. However, sometimes feedback in class is limited due to the amount of students in the class, so using GenAI can provide additional feedback that you might not always receive.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
